owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.agreementId: bytes32. The agreement id (issuance hash) of the debt agreement to which this pertains.
params.tokenAddress: address. The address of the token with which the repayment transaction was executed.
params.unitsOfRepayment: uint. The units-of-value repaid in the transaction.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getExpectedRepaymentValues(bytes32,uint2.notice: Expected repayment value with Amortization of Interest and Principal (AMORTIZATION) - will be used for repayment from Debtor

getTotalExpectedRepaymentValue(bytes32,u.notice: Get TOTAL expected repayment value at specific timestamp (NO AMORTIZATION)

registerConcludeTerm(bytes32).notice: Term will be completed if participants met all of conditions

registerDrawdownLoan(bytes32,uint256,byt.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Debtor to deposit more collateral

registerInsecureLoanByWithdrawCollateral.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Debtor to deposit more collateral

registerPayCollateralByFiat(bytes32,byte.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Buyer to pay for collateral by fiat

registerPayCollateralByInvoice(bytes32,b.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Buyer to pay for collateral by invoice

registerPayFromInvoice(bytes32,uint256,a.notice: Calculate CR after invoice payment and repay to loan if CR bellow min CR

registerRepayment(bytes32,uint256,addres.notice: When called, the registerRepayment function records the debtor's  repayment, as well as any auxiliary metadata needed by the contract  to determine ex post facto the value repaid (e.g. current USD  exchange rate)

registerSecureLoanWithCollateral(bytes32.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Debtor to deposit more collateral

registerSellCollateral(bytes32,uint256,u.notice: Function will be called by Debt Kernel, supports Debtor to sell collateral

registerTermStart(bytes32,address[2]).notice: Start terms contract and sieze collateral tokens
